Previous: śrīNext: śrī2

√śrī1 'mix'

present: [9.] śrīṇā́ti  śrīṇīté  

perfect: śiśriye  

aorist: [3.] aśiśrayus  

verbal: śrītá  śīrta  śrītvā  

derivatives: -śir  -śira S.+  -śrī V.  śrayaṇa S.  

Is probably only a form of √śri, from which it is at some points hardly separable. The interrelations of the roots sṛ, śrā, śri, śrī are intricate, and not yet fully worked out. Eepecially doubtful is it what is the connection with them of the noun śrī́ V.+ 'fortune', and the related śriyás RV., śréyas V.+, śréṣṭha V.+, śremán B.
